DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. This trial aims for a comparison of the efficacy and safety of Insulin Aspart, given in a fixed or in a flexible supplementary insulin therapy, with or without Insulin Detemir plus Metformin, if needed, in subjects with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of a Fixed or a Flexible Supplementary Insulin Therapy in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes for more than 6 months Treatment with 1 or more oral antidiabetic drugs or insulin, or a combination of these for more than 3 months Body Mass Index (BMI) less than or equal to 40 kg/m2 HbA1c 7.011.0% Treatment with short acting insulin(s) for longer than 10 days Current treatment with TZDs. A TZD medication must be stopped at least 14 days before the randomization Proliferative retinopathy or maculopathy requiring acute or laser treatment within the last 6 months
